text:
@realDonaldTrump "FL Hospital Hits Capacity W New Coronavirus Patients as State Reopens" @thedailybeast @GovRonDeSantis 

Wonder if these patients will also get hit with a $1.1 million bill like others did. But it's ok if they know ahead of time, right? What a great way to keep ICU beds empty.
